data.author: singleserveapps

changelog.release_notes: -- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite) watches
-- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4
-- Added options to set separate color choices for HR / MINUTES lines
-- Improved method for checking elapsed time since last weather update
-- Switched weather provider from Yahoo! Weather to OpenWeatherMap.org
- Fixed an issue with retrieving Yahoo! Weather using GPS (credit: Freakified)
- Fixed an issue with applying weather/date color at watchface restart

- Added option to set color for weather/date lines
- Added option to display/hide date information
- Corrected an issue with retrieving settings/weather updates for Pebble Classic & Pebble Steel
-- Updated to display "....." for "Unknown" Yahoo! Weather conditions
-- Fixed an issue when Yahoo! Weather returned an 'Unknown' weather condition
- Includes a fix for weather information not updating for some Android devices
- Display last weather update time according to12/24 hr preference

- Added option to retrieve weather information using GPS coordinates or by manually entering location
- Added vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
Added Bluetooth status check to update weather information when phone-watch connection is restored
Bug fixes and code cleanup
Display fix for lowercase g, p, and y weather conditions

Now using Yahoo! Weather
Added shake to display Lo Hi temps/last update option
Fixed issue where weather update was delayed on initial installation 
Force weather update by changing weather frequency
Update to app_message
Revised weather display lines for Pebble Time Round (CHALK)

data.description:
Inspired by Pebble's Sliding Text watchface with added weather and date lines.

- Select background, hour, minute, and weather/date colors
- Left/Center/Right alignment options for display lines
- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location
- Option to display today's lo - hi temperatures (+last weather update time)
- Choose to display/hide date information
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
- Readability options for weather/date and time display lines

If you're enjoying the SLIDING TIME WEATHER watchface, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.
data.title: Sliding Time Weather
